titleStmt.title: Phaeton, or, The fatal divorce a tragedy as it is acted at the Theatre Royal in imitation of the antients : with some reflections on a book call'd, A short view of the immorality and profaneness of the English stage.
titleStmt.author: Gildon, Charles, 1665-1724.
Euripides. Medea.

notesStmt.note: Plot taken from the Medea of Euripides.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
